definition: bamboo or wooden spear/Kangxi radical 79, occurring in 段, 毅, 殺 etc
in hundred and one ways/in every possible way/by every means
to have no way out/to have no alternative
to lower oneself to sb's level/to argue with sb less well-informed

sentences.english: Like young Long female although appearance if angel, actually icedcold sweetheart.
sentences.chinese: 像小龙女般虽然貌若天仙，却冷若冰霜的情人。

sentences.english: In early morning mist that rolls in from the coast, two brown bears tussle like teenagers.
sentences.chinese: 清晨，雾从海岸边涌来，两只棕熊像顽童般嬉闹。

sentences.english: Welcome to a world where you shape the epic sagas that will be told to future generations.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎来到这个留芳千古的史诗传奇般故事的世界。

sentences.english: Can he weigh out the feather-soft heart of maiden?
sentences.chinese: 少女羽毛般轻柔的心，他能掂出重量吗？

sentences.english: Trees are slashed down by the PLASMA CUTTERS.
sentences.chinese: 树木被切割机摧枯拉朽般砍倒。

sentences.english: A pair of iridescent pink scallops embrace each other like lovers.
sentences.chinese: 一对泛著粉彩光泽的扇贝，像情侣般相互拥抱著。

sentences.english: Thee love of royal celebrities has always been staged for the world to see.
sentences.chinese: 皇室名流们的爱情总是如戏剧般上演，受到世人瞩目。

sentences.english: The fish is so fresh, it is like a fish jumped on the table and cooked itself.
sentences.chinese: 活像是鱼自己跳上桌面瞬间煮熟般鲜美。

sentences.english: They are like junkies, with unkempt hair and beards, bad skin and poor appetites.
sentences.chinese: 跟毒瘾者般，头发胡子不修，皮肤苍白，缺乏食欲。

sentences.english: He's a full-blooded footballer with fantastic instincts.
sentences.chinese: 他是一名拥有幻想般本能的纯正的足球运动员。

sentences.english: Rough- hewn , angular notes, like stones in the wall of a churchyard.
sentences.chinese: 粗犷，生硬的音符，像墓地围墙上的石头般。

sentences.english: Her golden hair flared like the sun.
sentences.chinese: 她那金色的头发像阳光般熠熠发亮。

sentences.english: Her tiny, round lips were full like a tulip bulb.
sentences.chinese: 两片小而圆润的嘴唇好似郁金香的球茎般丰满。

sentences.english: His close-cropped beard lay like a shadow over his hollow cheeks .
sentences.chinese: 他剪短了的胡须如同阴影般笼罩在他凹陷的脸颊上。

sentences.english: This being looks at her with a hypnotically deep and steady gaze, as if penetrating her with its eyes.
sentences.chinese: 天使如催眠般深深凝望着她，仿佛要用目光将她穿透。

sentences.english: The old man was reduced to a skeleton.

definition: to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)
to be as if.../to be rather like...
variant of 彷彿|仿佛[fang3 fu2]
